createInvoiceFromOrder

java.lang.Integer createInvoiceFromOrder(java.lang.Integer orderId,
                                         java.lang.Integer invoiceId)
                                         throws com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException
Generates a new invoice for an order, or adds the order to an existing invoice.

Parameters:
orderId - order id to generate an invoice for
invoiceId - optional invoice id to add the order to. If null, a new invoice will be created.
Returns:
id of generated invoice, null if no invoice generated.
Throws:
com.infosense.ibilling.common.SessionInternalError - if user id or order id is null.
com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException

createUser

java.lang.Integer createUser(UserWS newUser)
                             throws com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException
Creates a new user. The user to be created has to be of the roles customer or partner. The user name has to be unique, otherwise the creating won't go through. If that is the case, the return value will be null.

Parameters:
newUser - The user object with all the information of the new user. If contact or credit card information are present, they will be included in the creation although they are not mandatory.
Returns:
The id of the new user, or null if non was created
Throws:
com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException

                        java.util.Date date)

updateCurrentOrder

OrderWS updateCurrentOrder(java.lang.Integer userId,
                           OrderLineWS[] lines,
                           com.infosense.ibilling.server.item.PricingField[] fields,
                           java.util.Date date,
                           java.lang.String eventDescription)
                           throws com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException
Updates the uesr's current one-time order for the given date. Returns the updated current order. Throws an exception for users with no main subscription order.

Throws:
com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException

applyPayment

java.lang.Integer applyPayment(PaymentWS payment,
                               java.lang.Integer invoiceId)
                               throws com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException
Enters a payment and applies it to the given invoice. This method DOES NOT process the payment but only creates it as 'Entered'. The entered payment will later be processed by the billing process. Invoice ID is optional. If no invoice ID is given the payment will be applied to the payment user's account according to the configured entity preferences.

Parameters:
payment - payment to apply
invoiceId - invoice id
Returns:
created payment id
Throws:
com.infosense.ibilling.common.SessionInternalError
com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException

PaymentWS getPayment(java.lang.Integer paymentId)

getUserTransitions

UserTransitionResponseWS[] getUserTransitions(java.util.Date from,
                                              java.util.Date to)
                                              throws com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException
Implementation of the User Transitions List webservice. This accepts a start and end date as arguments, and produces an array of data containing the user transitions logged in the requested time range.

Parameters:
from - Date indicating the lower limit for the extraction of transition logs. It can be null, in such a case, the extraction will start where the last extraction left off. If no extractions have been done so far and this parameter is null, the function will extract from the oldest transition logged.
to - Date indicatin the upper limit for the extraction of transition logs. It can be null, in which case the extraction will have no upper limit.
Returns:
UserTransitionResponseWS[] an array of objects containing the result of the extraction, or null if there is no data thas satisfies the extraction parameters.
Throws:
com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException

getUserTransitionsAfterId

                                                     throws com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException
Returns:

Throws:
com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException

processPayment

com.infosense.ibilling.server.payment.PaymentAuthorizationDTOEx processPayment(PaymentWS payment,
                                                                               java.lang.Integer invoiceId)
                                                                               throws com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException
Processes a payment and applies it to the given invoice. This method will actively processes the payment using the configured payment plug-in. Payment is optional when an invoice ID is provided. If no payment is given, the payment will be processed using the invoiced user's configured "automatic payment" instrument. Invoice ID is optional. If no invoice ID is given the payment will be applied to the payment user's account according to the configured entity preferences.

Parameters:
payment - payment to process
invoiceId - invoice id
Returns:
payment authorization from the payment processor
Throws:
com.infosense.ibilling.server.util.api.IbillingAPIException

createPlan

java.lang.Integer createPlan(com.infosense.ibilling.server.item.ItemDTOEx newPlan,
                             java.lang.Integer cpu,
                             java.lang.Integer memory,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> properties)
Generates a host item with given cpu, memory and other additional components

Parameters:
newPlan - The item object with all information
cpu - The number of cpu
memory - The number of memory
properties - A map of other additional components, the key is component name and value is quality of component
Returns:
the id of generated item
